Driver.Description: Shell to setup and run IxLoad traffic generator
Driver.Name: IxLoadControllerDriver

Command.Description: API only command to get IxLoad REST session ID
Command.Name: get_session_id

Command.Description: API only command to get IxLoad object children
Command.Name: get_children

Command.Description: API only command to get IxLoad object attributes
Command.Name: get_attributes

Command.Description: API only command to set IxLoad object attribute
Command.Name: set_attribute

Parameter.Description: Full path to IxLoad configuration file name
Parameter.Name: ixia_config_file_name

Parameter.Description: True - return after traffic finish to run, False - return immediately
Parameter.Name: blocking

Parameter.Description: Name of csv file from the IxLoad results directory (c:\temp\IxLoad)
Parameter.Name: view_name
